name: Blob: Chapter 2
description:
CONTROLS

WASD for movement

After defeating the 1st boss, you will gain an ability activated by pressing E

F to shoot (If it doesn't shoot, you have no bullets. if the purple rings appear, it failed. Yes, failed shots are intended.)

Space to activate shield

_________________________________________________

"A game with blobs shooting bullets, fireballs, other blobs, etc. There's a lot going on!"

I present... The worst game in the world! Once a scratch game, now technically still a scratch game because I used turbowarp packager. Anyways, the art style is bad on purpose, so don't complain about that. This is a dumpster disguised as a game, so even if you download for some reason, don't donate. please. But Blob is a (relatively) fast paced game, where you dodge other blobs and try to work your way up to taking down the almighty plasma blob.

This game includes:

-3 levels

-3 boss battles

-2 Elite boss battles 

-4 unique music tracks 

-A lot more!

Music:

Main Theme: Ultimatum (Video Game Boss Fight Music) - YouTube

Invisible Blob, Plasma Blob, And Flaming Blob Themes (All-out attack, The army of Minotaur, Saga of knight respectively): https://soundcloud.com/makai-symphony
